ModMetaData.name: Combat Shields
ModMetaData.author: N7Huntsman
ModMetaData.description:
Combat Shields adds a variety of shields to Rimworld from different cultures and eras. A special thanks to BukTaki for updating and developing the framework that helped make this mod possible.
Note: The Steam version of Harmony should be used only when using with mod in version 1.1. The Rimworld 1.0 version has a local copy of its own.
